languages.text: "Я более не потерплю убийств и кровавых ритуалов. Отныне культу запрещено творить свои расправы!"
"I will not have murders and bloody rituals committed on my ship. Henceforth, the cult is banned from engaging in such spectacles!"
languages.original_text: "Я более не потерплю убийств и кровавых ритуалов. Отныне культу запрещено творить свои расправы!"

traits.locale_text: "I will not have murders and bloody rituals committed on my ship. Henceforth, the cult is banned from engaging in such spectacles!"
"I will not have murders and bloody rituals committed on my ship. Henceforth, the cult is banned from engaging in such spectacles!"
"I will not have murders and bloody rituals committed on my ship. Henceforth, the cult is banned from engaging in such spectacles!"
"I will not have murders and bloody rituals committed on my ship. Henceforth, the cult is banned from engaging in such spectacles!"
"I will not have murders and bloody rituals committed on my ship. Henceforth, the cult is banned from engaging in such spectacles!"
"I will not have murders and bloody rituals committed on my ship. Henceforth, the cult is banned from engaging in such spectacles!"

languages.text: «No habrá asesinatos ni rituales sangrientos en mi nave. ¡De ahora en adelante, prohíbo al culto realizar estos espectáculos!».
languages.original_text: "I will not have murders and bloody rituals committed on my ship. Henceforth, the cult is banned from engaging in such spectacles!"

traits.locale_text: «No habrá asesinatos ni rituales sangrientos en mi nave. ¡De ahora en adelante, prohíbo al culto realizar estos espectáculos!».

languages.text: 「この船で、殺人や血なまぐさい儀式は許さない。今後、教団がそのような騒ぎを起こすことは禁ずる！」
languages.original_text: "I will not have murders and bloody rituals committed on my ship. Henceforth, the cult is banned from engaging in such spectacles!"

traits.locale_text: 「この船で、殺人や血なまぐさい儀式は許さない。今後、教団がそのような騒ぎを起こすことは禁ずる！」

languages.text: “我不允许任何人在我的船上进行谋杀与血腥仪式。从今往后，你的教派禁止再做这种事情！”
languages.original_text: "I will not have murders and bloody rituals committed on my ship. Henceforth, the cult is banned from engaging in such spectacles!"

traits.locale_text: “我不允许任何人在我的船上进行谋杀与血腥仪式。从今往后，你的教派禁止再做这种事情！”

languages.text: "Ich dulde keinen Mord und keine blutigen Rituale auf meinem Schiff. Dem Kult ist es ab sofort verboten, solche Spektakel abzuhalten!"
languages.original_text: "I will not have murders and bloody rituals committed on my ship. Henceforth, the cult is banned from engaging in such spectacles!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich dulde keinen Mord und keine blutigen Rituale auf meinem Schiff. Dem Kult ist es ab sofort verboten, solche Spektakel abzuhalten!"

languages.text: « Je ne tolérerai pas que des meurtres et des rituels sanglants soient commis à mon bord. Dorénavant, les membres de la secte ont interdiction de se donner ainsi en spectacle ! »
languages.original_text: "I will not have murders and bloody rituals committed on my ship. Henceforth, the cult is banned from engaging in such spectacles!"

traits.locale_text: « Je ne tolérerai pas que des meurtres et des rituels sanglants soient commis à mon bord. Dorénavant, les membres de la secte ont interdiction de se donner ainsi en spectacle ! »

languages.text: "Gemimde cinayetlerin ve kanlı ayinlerin işlenmesine göz yummayacağım. Bundan sonra tarikatın böyle törenler gerçekleştirmesi yasak!"
languages.original_text: "I will not have murders and bloody rituals committed on my ship. Henceforth, the cult is banned from engaging in such spectacles!"
